oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Letters
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: 2 drafts of a personal letter. The page was folded into two, one version was written on the left side horizontally; the other on the right side of the paper was written vertically to the first. The letter is written in a somewhat colloquial Arabic, with spelling mistakes and phonetic transcription. The writer describes a certain distress they're experiencing.
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Draft of Arabic letter
